p: NaAlH 4 is the most important and studied alanate. NaAlH 4 is used as a reducing agent in many reactions unrelated to the hydrogen storage. Due to the work of Bogdanović et al. on the use of catalysts or additives, the regeneration of NaAlH 4 is possible in the solid-state. Thus, this material has been seriously considered for hydrogen storage [ 7, 88, 115]. The dehydrogenation and rehydrogenation reactions are [ 7, 116]: NaAlH 4 → 1/3 Na 3AlH 6 + 2/3 Al + H 2 (25)
